Vincenzo (or anyone else too),

If you have a working example of how to use=
 Cantera from Fluent, I 
could add the files in an appropriate place in the=
 Cantera source 
distribution.  All you need to do is to send me the Makefi=
le and any 
C/C++ or other program files required to build and run the exam=
ple(s).

Dave


On Apr 23, 2004, at 3:53 AM, vincenzomulone wrote:

> Dear =
prof Goodwin and Martin,
> dear all,
>
> my work on the Fluent/Cantera coup=
ling is still far from being
> complete, since, at the present time, I have=
 only some simple
> functions available which allow cantera to be called by=
 fluent:

 know how can I do that.
